00033 #ifndef TIMER_HXX
00034 #define TIMER_HXX
00035 
00036 using namespace std;
00037 
00038 #include <sys/types.h>
00039 #include <sys/times.h>
00040 #include <iostream>
00041 
00042 class Timer {
00043    struct tms buffer_;           // buffer for timing info
00044    unsigned long startTime_;     // most recent start time
00045    unsigned long runTime_;       // time between most recent start/stop
00046    enum { IDLE, RUNNING } state_;
00047 public:
00048    Timer(): startTime_(0), runTime_(0), state_(IDLE) { }
00049 
00050    void start() {                // start timing
00051 #ifdef DEBUG
00052      cerr << "-> Timer::start, startTime_ = " << startTime_ << ", runTime_ = "
00053       << runTime_ << ", state_ = " << state_ << endl;
00054 #endif
00055       if (state_ != IDLE) {
00056          cerr << endl << "Timer::start -- already started." << endl;
00057          abort();
00058       }
00059       state_ = RUNNING;
00060       times(&buffer_);
00061       startTime_ = buffer_.tms_utime;
00062       runTime_ = 0;
00063 #ifdef DEBUG
00064      cerr << "<- Timer::start, startTime_ = " << startTime_ << ", runTime_ = "
00065       << runTime_ << ", state_ = " << state_ << endl;
00066 #endif
00067    }
00068 
00069    void stop() {                 // stop timing
00070 #ifdef DEBUG
00071      cerr << "->Timer::stop, startTime_ = " << startTime_ << ", runTime_ = "
00072       << runTime_ << ", state_ = " << state_ << endl;
00073 #endif
00074       if (state_ != RUNNING) {
00075          cerr << endl << "Timer::stop -- no matching start." << endl;
00076          abort();
00077       }
00078       state_ = IDLE;
00079       times(&buffer_);
00080       runTime_ = buffer_.tms_utime - startTime_;
00081       startTime_ = 0;
00082 #ifdef DEBUG
00083      cerr << "<-Timer::stop, startTime_ = " << startTime_ << ", runTime_ = "
00084       << runTime_ << ", state_ = " << state_ << endl;
00085 #endif
00086    }
00087 
00088    double seconds() { // return time in seconds between most recent start/stop
00089                       //  or seconds since last start, if no intervening stop
00090       if ( RUNNING ) {
00091          times(&buffer_);
00092          return (buffer_.tms_utime - startTime_) / 60.0;
00093       }
00094       return (runTime_ / 60.0);
00095    }
00096 };
00097 #endif
